therapy_0: ^"Welcome, Peggy and Rocky. I’m so glad you both decided to come in today. Therapy is a big step, and it’s one that can help us explore how you’re feeling and what’s been going on in your relationship. Why don’t we start by sharing a little about how you two met? What brought you together?"
^"Oh, it’s such a story. Classic city romance: boy meets girl, girl dazzles boy, boy sweeps girl off her claws with fried breadcrumbs and cheap carnival games."
^"Cheap carnival games??? I’ll have you know I won you that plush donut. Took me three tries and, honestly, half my dinner money… took me as long as that scavenger hunt"
^"Yeah, yeah, I guess you were kinda charming, huh?"
^"It sounds like that first date had a lot of playful moments..those little gestures that build connection. And I heard there was a scavenger hunt involved?"
^"Oh, yeah. I challenged him to find the perfect gift for me. Gave him ten minutes to prove his worth."
^"Rocky, when you were picking out gifts, what was on your mind?"
^"Rocky, how did you feel being put on the spot?"
^"Rocky, did you think Peggy's idea was creative?"
